recipe_name: Honey and vanilla rice pudding with oranges
author: James Tanner
method: Preheat the oven to 180C/350F/Gas 4. Place the rice, milk, cream, vanilla seeds and honey into a pan over a medium heat and bring to the boil. Transfer to an ovenproof gratin dish and place into the oven to cook for 8-10 minutes, or until cooked through and golden-brown on top. Serve garnished with orange slices, drizzled with honey.
ingredients: 100g/3Â½oz long grain rice,  400ml/14fl oz milk,  2 tbsp double cream,  1 vanilla pod, split, seeds only,  3 tbsp honey,  1 orange, peeled and sliced,  1 tbsp honey
